stories.title: How Elizabeth Taylor Remade the Novel of Old Age
Have we got the science of obesity back to front?

stories.text:
Hello HN,
I’ve been noticing I received at least 2 or 3 email that should have been marked as spam every day. 
The weirdest thing is that the same exact template, with a different sender but still same domain, are able to go through the spam filter. 
This has been happening for the last 2 months. It seems like the gmail spam filter stopped working. Has this been happening to you as well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Did you notice a degrade in the spam detection on Gmail?
Tell HN: Is 2022 and you still haven't deleted your Facebook

stories.text:
A lot of users on twitter[1], myself included, just received a payment by DigitalOcean out of the blue. Turns out they apparently refunded the unused funds of inactive users.

[1]: https://twitter.com/search?q=digitalocean%20paypal&src=typed_query&f=live
stories.title: DigitalOcean just refunded unused funds back to inactive users' PayPal accounts
